document.full_text: group of 20 finance ministers and central bankers meeting in washington later this week are expected to reach an agreement on guidelines to identify global economic imbalances, french government sources said on tuesday.
document.title: g20 ministers to set imbalances guidelines this week
lines_and_colors: group of 20 finance ministers and central bankers meeting in washington later this week are expected to reach an agreement on guidelines to identify global economic imbalances, french government sources said on tuesday.
